H0.text: Who became Germany's first female chancellor. Angela Davis

H1.text: Who became Germany's first female chancellor. Claudia Roth

H2.text: Who became Germany's first female chancellor. Ursula von der Leyen

H3.text: Who became Germany's first female chancellor. Merkel

A4.text: She is the only woman to have held the office and the only from former East Germany.

A5.text: She was the first woman to be elected chancellor, and the first chancellor of reunified Germany to have been raised in the former East Germany.
